verses.verse: <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> an <S%G652>apostle<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> to the <S%G3927>strangers<s%> <S%G1290>scattered<s%> throughout <S%G4195>Pontus,<s%> <S%G1053>Galatia,<s%> <S%G2587>Cappadocia,<s%> <S%G773>Asia,<s%> and <S%G978>Bithynia,<s%>

<S%G1588>Elect<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G4268>foreknowledge<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> the <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> <S%G38>sanctification<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> to <S%G5218>obedience<s%> and <S%G4473>sprinkling<s%> of the <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ:<s%> <S%G5485>Grace<s%> to you, and <S%G1515>peace,<s%> be <S%G4129>multiplied.<s%>

<S%G2128>Blessed<s%> be the <S%G2316>God<s%> and <S%G3962>Father<s%> of our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to his <S%G4183>abundant<s%> <S%G1656>mercy<s%> has <S%G313>begotten<s%> us <S%G313>again<s%> to a <S%G2198>lively<s%> <S%G1680>hope<s%> by the <S%G386>resurrection<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead,<s%>
To an <S%G2817>inheritance<s%> <S%G862>incorruptible,<s%> and <S%G283>undefiled,<s%> and that <S%G268>fades<s%> not away, <S%G5083>reserved<s%> in <S%G3772>heaven<s%> for you,

<S%G3588>Who<s%> are <S%G5432>kept<s%> by the <S%G1411>power<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> to <S%G4991>salvation<s%> <S%G2092>ready<s%> to be <S%G601>revealed<s%> in the <S%G2078>last<s%> <S%G2540>time.<s%>

<S%G1722>Wherein<s%> <S%G3757><s%> you greatly <S%G21>rejoice,<s%> though <S%G737>now<s%> for a <S%G3641>season,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G1163>need<s%> be, you are in <S%G3076>heaviness<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> <S%G4164>manifold<s%> <S%G3986>temptations:<s%>

That the <S%G1383>trial<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4102>faith,<s%> <S%G1096>being<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> more <S%G5093>precious<s%> than of <S%G5553>gold<s%> that <S%G622>perishes,<s%> though it be <S%G1381>tried<s%> with <S%G4442>fire,<s%> might be <S%G2147>found<s%> to <S%G1868>praise<s%> and <S%G5092>honor<s%> and <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> the <S%G602>appearing<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ:<s%>

<S%G3739>Whom<s%> having not <S%G1492>seen,<s%> you <S%G25>love;<s%> in whom, though <S%G737>now<s%> you <S%G3708>see<s%> him not, <S%G1161>yet<s%> <S%G4100>believing,<s%> you <S%G21>rejoice<s%> with <S%G5479>joy<s%> <S%G412>unspeakable<s%> and full of <S%G1392>glory:<s%>
<S%G2865>Receiving<s%> the <S%G5056>end<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4102>faith,<s%> even the <S%G4991>salvation<s%> of your <S%G5590>souls.<s%>

Of <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G4991>salvation<s%> the <S%G4396>prophets<s%> have <S%G1567>inquired<s%> and <S%G1830>searched<s%> diligently, <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G4395>prophesied<s%> of the <S%G5485>grace<s%> that should come to you:

<S%G2045>Searching<s%> <S%G1519>what,<s%> <S%G5101><s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G4169>what<s%> <S%G4169>manner<s%> of <S%G2540>time<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> was in them did <S%G1213>signify,<s%> when it <S%G4303>testified<s%> <S%G4303>beforehand<s%> the <S%G3804>sufferings<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> and the <S%G1391>glory<s%> that should <S%G3326>follow.<s%> <S%G5023><s%>

To <S%G3739>whom<s%> it was <S%G601>revealed,<s%> that not to <S%G1438>themselves,<s%> but to us they did <S%G1247>minister<s%> the <S%G846>things,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> are <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G312>reported<s%> to you by them that have <S%G2097>preached<s%> the <S%G2097>gospel<s%> to you with the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> down from <S%G3772>heaven;<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> things the <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G1937>desire<s%> to <S%G3879>look<s%> <S%G1519>into.<s%>

<S%G1352>Why<s%> <S%G328>gird<s%> up the <S%G3751>loins<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G1271>mind,<s%> be <S%G3525>sober,<s%> and <S%G1679>hope<s%> to the <S%G5049>end<s%> for the <S%G5485>grace<s%> that is to be <S%G5342>brought<s%> to you <S%G1722>at<s%> the <S%G602>revelation<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ;<s%>
As <S%G5218>obedient<s%> <S%G5043>children,<s%> not <S%G4964>fashioning<s%> yourselves <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G4386>former<s%> <S%G1939>lusts<s%> in <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G52>ignorance:<s%>
But as he which has <S%G2564>called<s%> you is <S%G40>holy,<s%> <S%G2532>so<s%> be you <S%G40>holy<s%> in <S%G3956>all<s%> manner of <S%G391>conversation;<s%>
<S%G1360>Because<s%> it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> Be you <S%G40>holy;<s%> for I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G40>holy.<s%>

And <S%G1487>if<s%> you <S%G1941>call<s%> <S%G1941>on<s%> the <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G678>without<s%> <S%G678>respect<s%> of <S%G678>persons<s%> <S%G2919>judges<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to <S%G1538>every<s%> man's <S%G2041>work,<s%> <S%G390>pass<s%> the <S%G5550>time<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3940>sojourning<s%> here in <S%G5401>fear:<s%>

For as much as you <S%G1492>know<s%> that you were not <S%G3084>redeemed<s%> with <S%G5349>corruptible<s%> things, as <S%G694>silver<s%> and <S%G5553>gold,<s%> from <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3152>vain<s%> <S%G391>conversation<s%> received by tradition from <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3970>fathers;<s%>
But with the <S%G5093>precious<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> as of a <S%G286>lamb<s%> <S%G784>without<s%> <S%G299>blemish<s%> and <S%G784>without<s%> <S%G784>spot:<s%>

Who <S%G3303>truly<s%> was <S%G4267>foreordained<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> the <S%G2602>foundation<s%> of the <S%G2889>world,<s%> but was <S%G5319>manifest<s%> in <S%G3588>these<s%> <S%G2078>last<s%> <S%G5550>times<s%> for you,

<S%G3588>Who<s%> by him do <S%G4100>believe<s%> in <S%G2316>God,<s%> that <S%G1453>raised<s%> him up from the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> and <S%G1325>gave<s%> him <S%G1391>glory;<s%> that <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> and <S%G1680>hope<s%> might be in <S%G2316>God.<s%>

Seeing you have <S%G48>purified<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5590>souls<s%> in <S%G5218>obeying<s%> the <S%G225>truth<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> to <S%G505>unfeigned<s%> <S%G5360>love<s%> of the <S%G5360>brothers,<s%> see that you <S%G25>love<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another<s%> with a <S%G2513>pure<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%> <S%G1619>fervently:<s%>

Being <S%G313>born<s%> <S%G313>again,<s%> not of <S%G5349>corruptible<s%> <S%G4701>seed,<s%> but of <S%G862>incorruptible,<s%> by the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> which <S%G2198>lives<s%> and <S%G3306>stays<s%> for <S%G165>ever.<s%>

For <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%> is as <S%G5528>grass,<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> as the <S%G438>flower<s%> of <S%G5528>grass.<s%> The <S%G5528>grass<s%> <S%G3583>wither,<s%> and the <S%G438>flower<s%> <S%G846>thereof<s%> <S%G1601>falls<s%> <S%G1601>away:<s%>

But the <S%G4487>word<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G3306>endures<s%> for <S%G165>ever.<s%> And <S%G5124>this<s%> is the <S%G4487>word<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> by the <S%G2097>gospel<s%> is <S%G2097>preached<s%> to you.
